title: The widdow a comedie, as it was acted at the private house in Black-Fryers, with great applause, by His late Majesties servants / written by Ben. Johnson, John Fletcher, Tho. Middleton, Gent. ...
author: Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627.
publisher: Printed for Humphrey Moseley, and are to be sold at his shop ...,
